casebody.data:
Stephanie SZYMONIK
v.
Peter T. SZYMONIK Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 10, 2018

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 182 Conn.App. 902, 184 A.3d 840 (2018), is denied.

MULLINS, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
